text: Ofisa Francis Junior Tonu'u (born 3 February 1970 in Wellington) is a Samoan- New Zealand retired rugby union player who played from 1992 to 1998. He also played cricket as a wicket-keeper, and represented Samoa in four Twenty20 Internationals in 2019.Ofisa Tonu'u. ESPNcricinfo. Retrieved 26 May 2025. title: Ofisa Tonu'u
